description:
Everyone knows you can learn a lot on the internet, and some of it is even true. But if you want to know what's REALLY going on and important, then there's just one place to go: the computer club!

Okay, so maybe it's not the club itself, but the three girls you're most likely to find there. And maybe they do spend more time chatting about their social lives and debating things like the virtues of ketchup versus mayonnaise than they do learning about the ins and outs of a keyboard, but whatever they're up to, it's sure to put a smile on your face.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

[Profile (Aoni Pro)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/tsuda-minami.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minami_tsuda3)│[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/minamimogumogu/)

She announced on June 8th, 2024 that she got married to fellow voice actor [Tatsumaru Tachibana](https://anilist.co/staff/137436/Tatsumaru-Tachibana).

__Current Residence:__ Tokyo, Japan
__Height:__ 150.3 cm
__Hobbies and Abilities:__ fashion, shopping, memorization
__Agency:__ 81 Produce

[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=169) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rumirumi_81pro) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rumirumi_81/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/rumiokubo/) | [Web Diary](http://gree.jp/ookubo_rumi) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/30941.html) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/OkuboRumi927) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rumi_Okubo) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E4%B9%85%E4%BF%9D%E7%91%A0%E7%BE%8E)

She was discovered in 81 Produce's 3rd Seiyuu Audition in August, 2009, becoming one of the seven finalists amongst 1,109 who took initially part and won the excellence prize in the end. She made her debut in a minor role for the anime [Sasameki Koto](https://anilist.co/anime/6203).

(Source: AniDB)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Ami Aiba in "Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth" (VG)
- Arin in "Fairy Fencer F" (VG)
- Elizabeth Bathory in "Fate/Grand Order" (VG)
- Female Protagonist in "Digimonstory Cybersleuth" (VG)
- Isto in "ToHeart2 Dungeon Travelers 2" (VG)
- Lancer in "Fate/Extra CCC" (VG)
- Little Red Riding Hood in "Kongokutou Mary Skelter" (VG)
- Lunalu in "Granlue Fantasy" (VG)
- Mayuka Morimoto in "Chou Ginga Sendan -Infinity-" (VG)
- Misaki Shinoyama in "Star Horse Pocket" (VG)
- Rider (Astolfo) in "Fate/Grand Order" (VG)
- Tia in "Goddess of Victory: Nikke" (VG)

__Agency:__ Office Osawa
 
[Profile](https://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/tanedarisa/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tane_da_dayo/)

On September 1, 2016, Office Osawa announced that Taneda would put her career on hiatus to focus on treatment for her throat, various roles she done were recast during this time such as Erina Nakiri from Food Wars who was replaced by Hisako Kanemoto from Season 3 and onwards.

On August 4, 2017, Office Osawa announced that her treatment was successful and she would gradually return to voice acting.

__Non-anime roles:__
~!
• D.Va in "Overwatch" (VG)
• Kuon in Utawarerumono (VG series)
• Shirasu Azusa in Blue Archive (VG)
!~
Had major debut in 2007. Lived in Berlin and several other capitals of Europe when she didn't have a permanent residence.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mikamikomata) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=873657)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/331643934) | [Website](http://mazurka.moo.jp/)

While studying for a university degree in art, she was discovered by web artists [Shingo Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114914/) and [Kenichi Kutsuna](https://anilist.co/staff/116007/), who recruited her to work on [Birdy Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/). She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.

She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/80780272)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakaiasuka)
[Website](https://irmagroup.jp/irma_artist/sakaiasuka)

Asuka Sakai (境亜寿香, Sakai Asuka) is a Japanese composer and musician working for NAMCO. She's best known for her works on various soundtracks from the 塊魂 (Katamari Damacy) and Ridge Racer video game series. She has released 2 albums to date on the IRMA records label and now mainly works in music production for games and anime.

She has contributed music to the following games:
- Ace Combat 3
- Libero Grande 2
- R4: Ridge Racer Type 4
- Klonoa 2: Lunatea's Veil
- Panikuru Panekuru
- Katamari Damacy
- Soul Caliber II
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/245670480)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekopapapa)

The representative director of [Kinema Citrus](https://anilist.co/studio/290/).
